item.title: Hack The Box - Craft
item.description: Welcome to another Forest Hex hacking adventure! üå≤üèπ ####Today I'm going to exploit some poor programming decisions and leverage those into a root shell. Grab a beer and come along for the ride. Feel free to jump around: Port Scan Exploring the Web Server Exploring Git Exploiting Python for a Reverse Shell Pivoting for More Access Gaining Root Access Port Scan As always, I start with a port scan to see what's open.

item.title: Hack The Box - Beep
item.description: Welcome to another Forest Hex hacking adventure! üå≤üèπ Today's plan is to explore a retired CTF from http://hackthebox.eu named “Beep”. I chose this box because it's easy, it's linux, and it's rated very highly. All that put together should add up to some serious fun, so let's get started: Port Scan Poking around the mySql Server Checking out Webmin Hylafax, what are you hiding? Back to Elastix Getting User and Root Port Scan The first thing, as always, is a port scan:
